last_episode_to_air.name: Daisy of Lust, Friendship, or Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Daisy takes her three remaining men to Maui for some romance. However, only one will remain and become her rockstar.

name: Daisy of Love
overview: Daisy of Love is an American reality television dating show which stars Daisy de la Hoya, the runner-up of the VH1 reality dating show Rock of Love 2. The show premiered on April 26, 2009, at 9:00 pm ET on VH1.

episodes.name: Don't be Stupid
episodes.overview: Daisy, with the help of her friend Riki Rachman, gives the twenty male contestants nicknames. Afterwards, Daisy gets to know the men.

episodes.name: Here's Blood in Your Eye
episodes.overview: Daisy organizes a "show and tell" challenge for the guys.

episodes.name: True Bromance
episodes.overview: Daisy sends the twelve guys on an obstacle course mission, along with paintball sharpshooters, to see if they have what it takes to protect her.

episodes.name: Should I Stay or Should I Go?
episodes.overview: Daisy has the guys rewrite some nursery rhymes with a rock-and-roll touch. Later, Daisy's friends hang out with the guys and let Daisy know who they think is there for her.

episodes.name: Bring in 'Da Boyz, Bring in 'Da Skunk
episodes.overview: Daisy challenges the remaining men to create a cover shot for her new single. Later on, two guys get physical, as well as one creature stirring up trouble.

episodes.name: Things Are Getting Spicy
episodes.overview: Daisy challenges the remaining men to create a cover shot for her new single. Later on, two guys get physical, as well as one creature stirring up trouble.

episodes.name: Call's Fair in Love and War
episodes.overview: An alliance is formed between the guys against one of their own, Fox, when he is suspected of having a girlfriend back home.

episodes.name: Still Haven't Found What I'm Cooking For
episodes.overview: Wanting a man that can cook, Daisy organises a challenge for the remaining men that involves preparing a five course meal.

episodes.name: The Return of the Fling
episodes.overview: Daisy has dinner with 12 Pack and Sinister, after she enjoys some off road vehicle riding with Chi Chi and Flex.

episodes.name: The Past and the Furious
episodes.overview: Daisy calls over the Ex-girlfriends of the remaining men and goes to a psychic to see which man is right for her.

episodes.name: Clip Show
episodes.overview: Daisy reviews her "Rules Of Dating" to the viewers, from the things that she has experienced in the house. Including highlights and never-before-seen clips from the series.

episodes.name: Daisy of Lust, Friendship, or Love
episodes.overview: Daisy takes her three remaining men to Maui for some romance. However, only one will remain and become her rockstar.
